segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink—water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still running, and it's flooding the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked soon if she doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is spreading fast across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids—the boy on that shaky stool terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand out for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling everywhere, what a mess they're making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom has no idea, she's too absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it turns into disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end with tears and broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
